titlestmt.titleproper: Finding Aid for Boston-Edison Protective Association records, 1926-1983.
titlestmt.author: Justin Lee Tyler

repository.corpname: Detroit Public Library. Burton Historical Collection.

did.unittitle: Boston-Edison Protective Association records,
did.abstract: Correspondence, articles of incorporation, bylaws, minutes, membership rosters, and material relating to violations of restrictions and legal cases regarding the zoning restrictions in the historic district within Boston, Edison, and other streets.

otherfindaid.head: Other finding aids note
otherfindaid.p: Finding aid and white index cards available in the Burton Historical Collection and the World Wide Web.

controlaccess.head: Selected Search Terms
controlaccess.p: This collection is indexed under the following headings in the online catalog. Researchers desiring materials about related topics, persons, or places should search the catalog using these headings.

dsc.head: Container List
dsc.p: The following section contains a detailed listing of the materials in the collection.
